recommendations.comment: It's here! The Gatsby vs Next.js @syntaxfm podcast. What should you choose for your next React project?

Last year I chose @gatsbyjs over #NextJS for my site. Why? Well, take a listen to @wesbos and @stolinski on the latest episode of @syntaxfm dvanc.co/gvn
Theyâ€™ve done an awesome job explaining the pros and cons of each of the 2 big contenders in the #headlesscms world.
Enjoyed the @syntaxfm episode on Gatsby vs NextJs. It was a great high-level look at pros/cons of each and use cases for one versus the other.
A great episode from @syntaxfm about @gatsbyjs and #Nextjs. And now I'm more convinced the best framework for my #Nogizaka46 PWA is @gatsbyjs.
